verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w See|strong="H7200"\w*, \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w by|strong="H7121"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Bezalel|strong="H1212"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Uri, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hur|strong="H2354"\w*, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2451"\w* \w I|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w God|strong="H2451"\w*, \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w skill|strong="H2451"\w*, ability, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \w in|strong="H4399"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w kinds|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w craftsmanship|strong="H4399"\w*,

\w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w design|strong="H4284"\w* \w artistic|strong="H2803"\w* \w works|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w*,

\w to|strong="H6213"\w* cut gemstones \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w settings|strong="H4390"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* carve \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w may|strong="H6213"\w* \w be|strong="H6086"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* master \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* craft.

\w Moreover|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* selected Oholiab \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahisamach, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* assistant. \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w also|strong="H6213"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w skill|strong="H2451"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* craftsmen, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w may|strong="H6213"\w* fashion \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*:

\w the|strong="H3605"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Testimony|strong="H5715"\w* \f + \fr 31:7 \ft That is, the ark of the covenant\f* \w and|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3727"\w* \w seat|strong="H3727"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3627"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* \w furnishings|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tent—

\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w with|strong="H3627"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w utensils|strong="H3627"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* gold \w lampstand|strong="H4501"\w* \w with|strong="H3627"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w utensils|strong="H3627"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*,

\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w with|strong="H3627"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w utensils|strong="H3627"\w*, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w basin|strong="H3595"\w* \w with|strong="H3627"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w stand|strong="H3653"\w*—

\w as|strong="H3547"\w* well \w as|strong="H3547"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w woven|strong="H8278"\w* garments, both \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* garments \w for|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* garments \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3548"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w serve|strong="H3547"\w* \w as|strong="H3547"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*,

\w in|strong="H6213"\w* addition \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w fragrant|strong="H5561"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w Place|strong="H6944"\w*. \w They|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* according \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H6680"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w*.” The Sign of the Sabbath (Numbers 15:32–36)
\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w Tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, ‘\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w Sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sign \w between|strong="H3045"\w* \w Me|strong="H8104"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w come|strong="H3478"\w*, \w so|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w sanctifies|strong="H6942"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w Anyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w profanes|strong="H2490"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*. \w Whoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w on|strong="H4399"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H6944"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w For|strong="H6213"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w complete|strong="H7677"\w* \w rest|strong="H7677"\w*, \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Whoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, celebrating \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w permanent|strong="H5769"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sign between \w Me|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w rested|strong="H7673"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w refreshed|strong="H5314"\w*.’” Moses Receives the Tablets

\w When|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w on|strong="H1696"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, \w He|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tablets|strong="H3871"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, \w tablets|strong="H3871"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* stone \w inscribed|strong="H3789"\w* \w by|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* finger \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*.
